result.eng: Every member (except elected members) can be reappointed.
result.ga: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadh
result.orig: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadh
result.html: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadhEvery member (except elected members) can be reappointed.
result.ponchtml: Féadfar coṁalta seaċas coṁalta tofa a aṫċeapaḋEvery member (except elected members) can be reappointed.
